attributes.action: make the 9th of September 2009 (9.9.9) "National Emergency Services Day"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The rare occurrence of this date should be marked with a remembrance of our commendable emergency services - Ambulance, Fire, Police, Coastguard, and all of our other emergency services we rely on as a nation on a daily basis.

These brave citizens selflessly put their lives on the line so that they may save others; they deserve a day of recognition.

Shake the hand of a police officer, firefighter, ambulance personnel or anyone in your community who provides a service to protect the lives and wellbeing of others.

Support National Emergency Services Day!
